newsitem.title: UK: August Oseberg programme equiv 38.6 cargoes - trade.
newsitem.headline: August Oseberg programme equiv 38.6 cargoes - trade.

text.p: Norway's Oseberg crude system will load the equivalent of 38.6 standard cargoes in August, down from the 40.8 cargoes expected in July, traders said.
Total volume in the programme was 19.32 million barrels, they said.
The programme consisted of nine cargoes of 500,000 barrels, 17 loadings of 600,000, one vessel of 1.8 million barrels, one of two million and one cargo of 820,000, the traders said.
Oseberg loaded the equivalent of 30.7 standard cargoes in June, when summer maintenance was at its peak, and 44.2 cargoes equivalent in May.
